page.title: 19Village Amenities
page.content: Ewelme is a small village and you have to come out of the village for some things. I have to come out of the village to get shopping and if someone is ill we have to go to the doctors. I dont usually have to catch a bus because my dad has a car and my mum has a car We sometimes go to the cinema and we have to go out of the village for that. There is a little cinema in Henley which is about 10 miles away from school. If my mum wants to buy clothing she goes into Wallingford, Henley, Oxford or Reading. Benson is two miles away, Wallingford three and a half, Henley ten miles, Oxford fourteen miles and Reading about fifteen miles from Ewelme.
